title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, and pull models via the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI) that offers ChatGPT-like interface, file uploads, RAG, and user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting synchronous and asynchronous chat, generate, embed, and model management APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama for local embeddings and generation, Chroma for vector store, and LangChain for orchestration.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean React chatbot UI that connects to a local Ollama instance via the OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for local code completion and chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Terminal User Interface) for Ollama written in Rust, offering model browsing, chat history, and keyboard shortcuts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async chat, generate, and model management; targets .NET 6+ and ships on NuGet.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama, providing async chat endpoints, token counting, and admin UI for model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate that exposes strongly-typed async functions for chat, generate, pull, and delete models via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands, thread support, and mod tools.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI sidebar powered by Ollama for summarizing notes, brainstorming, and Q&A.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that connects workspaces to Ollama for private or channel-based chat with configurable model and system prompts.

title: ollama-keras
summary: KerasNLP experimental wrapper that exposes Ollama models as Keras generators for fine-tuning and evaluation pipelines.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Ollama enabling LangChain agents to discover and call local models over stdio.
